messages.content: We are writing to you regarding the forthcoming elections on 7th May 2015.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ending Labour's past economic chaos and continuing to deliver economic growth and jobs.
Controlling Immigration and providing fairness with English votes for English laws.
Giving us the opportunity of having an 'in - out' referendum on the EU.

issues.brexitEurope: Giving us the opportunity of having an 'in - out' referendum on the EU.
issues.economy: Ending Labour's past economic chaos and continuing to deliver economic growth and jobs.
issues.governance: Controlling Immigration and providing fairness with English votes for English laws.
issues.immigration: Controlling Immigration and providing fairness with English votes for English laws.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your Prospective Parliamentary Candidate and an experienced campaigner I am getting things done. I am determined that we maintain British rights and sovereignty and I am committed to continuing the work of Sir Richard working for ALL of the people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Working locally in securing the Village Centre with the 'pelsallfirst' team. Has been resolute in his commitment to the people of Pelsall and will continue to work hard for everyone if re-elected.

contactInformation.address: Aldridge-Brownhills Conservative and Unionist Association, 82 Walsall Road, Aldridge, Walsall, WS9 0JW

images.caption: Prospective Parliamentary Candidate Wendy Morton and Walsall Council Candidate for Pelsall Marco Longhi.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The forthcoming elections on 7th May are extremely important in determining the future of Britain and of Pelsall.
